string.text: You're chained up naked for all to see as potential buyers grope and prod you, sticking fingers in your mouth and up your cunt and ass. A few of them even try to sample your goods before buying, but the slave trader is wise to their antics, and swats them away before they can penetrate you. As the day goes on, a finely-dressed man approaches you, looking you up and down with a practiced eye, and stops to talk to the trader. A pouch of gold changes hands and you're released from your shackles, only for a new, shiny pair to be clasped around your wrists as the man explains that one of the city's notables has been looking for a pleasure slave of your description.
Follow them to your new master.
Follow them to your new mistress.

You are sold as a concubine to a noble house. Half a dozen other slaves busy themselves with their daily chores about the luxurious town villa, paying you little heed. It would appear you have a singular purpose here. You wonder if otherwise, you will be left alone and not expected to take part in the daily drudgery of menial slave tasks?

Your suspicions are confirmed when two older women with greying hair, also slaves, are summoned to bathe you. They are very thorough, scrubbing every part of you clean, immaculately grooming you, and intimately cleansing you with soap and perfumed oils. Even your mouth is washed with tonics, and your breath comes to smell of mint and elderflower.

You are told you will have to observe a close hygiene regimen, lest you end up like â€œthat other slut.â€ From your mealtimes, all the way to your bodily functions and regular cleansing of your bowels with fragrant water, nothing must be left to chance, and you must be available to your owner at all times unless you are abluting yourself.
Pay close attention to your new daily routines.

You canâ€™t remember ever being this clean in your life. It certainly makes a change from all the stories you have heard of being held as captive in dank dungeons or seedy brothels. You are given a small but comfortable room to yourself, and are told to wait until summoned by your master.
Begin your new life as a concubine.

{?DAYS}You've been a concubine at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a concubine at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} Wearing the bare minimum, you await until your master has a need for your body.
Try to escape.

{?DAYS}You've been a concubine at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a concubine at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} Wearing the bare minimum, you await until your mistress has a need for your body.

You carefully escape while your guards are distracted, and make your way out the window, reaching the ground with a burst of relief. Just as you move to hide behind a passing caravan, you feel a muscled hand grasp your arm, and you're roughly shoved against the wall. One of the guards appears to have caught up to you with commendable speed, and whispers menacingly that seeing as how you're such a clever little whore he'll be sure to give you extra special attention from now on...
Maybe that wasn't a great idea...

You carefully escape while your guards are distracted, and make your way out the window, reaching the ground with a burst of relief. You move to hide behind a passing caravan, realizing only too late that it's filled with slaves on their way to the market. The caravan guard smiles nastily at you, informing their employer that a new piece of merchandise has kindly volunteered itself for the market. Their cruel laughs ring in your ears as you are chained to a post, ready to be sold to the highest bidder.
Maybe that was a terrible idea...

You're almost spotted by a group of unusually wary guards as you escape, but manage to give them the slip by dropping a dish in another room as you scurry away. You don't allow yourself to relax until you're quite a ways from them, but the feeling of relief when you're finally sure you're free is overwhelming and very, very welcome.
Continue your journey.

{OWNER_NAME} grins as he runs his hands across your supple flesh, caressing your breasts, and whispering his dirty, depraved thoughts into your ears. He clearly intends to fuck his newest acquisition immediately.
Lie on the bed and spread your legs for him.
You do as {OWNER_NAME} commands and let your master take you. He is neither slow nor gentle, and immediately starts pummeling his new whore deep into the sheets of his expensive bed.
Grab his buttocks and pull him into you.

Your master does not take long to fill your womb with his seed, his sweet breath hot against your neck, his manhood throbbing within you. He climbs off of you as his semen leaks from your abused pussy, clearly done with you.
Return to your quarters, wash, pamper yourself, and wait.

{OWNER_NAME} summons you to her quarters, a richly adorned bedroom with a luxury bed at centerstage you imagine you will be spending a lot of time on. She is dressed in a revealing white silk dress, ordering you to dress similarly in black lingerie. Her eyes linger lustfully all over your body, predatorily even. Perhaps she intends to employ you as a prostitute? She dismisses you with a smile that says she is very much looking forward to your next encounter.
